instructions: Image titled Make Desktop Icons Smaller Step 1 1 Open the Settings app, then select Display and Brightness . [3] While there s no way to customize the size of your icons on your iPhone or iPad, there is a way to fix the issue of your device having abnormally large icons. If your device wound up in Zoom Mode, it s easy to turn it off. If the icons are too large to navigate to the Settings app, double-tap the screen with three fingers to zoom out, then try again. Image titled Make Desktop Icons Smaller Step 2 2 Look at the entry for View beneath Display Mode . [4] There are two possible options here: Standard: If the view is set to Standard , your phone is not in Zoom Mode, and you won t be able to make the icons smaller. Zoomed: If it is set to Zoomed , changing it to Standard will reduce the icon size. Image titled Make Desktop Icons Smaller Step 3 3 Tap Zoomed (if present). Now you will see a new screen that says Display Zoom at its top. Image titled Make Desktop Icons Smaller Step 4 4 Tap Standard , then tap Set . This will reduce the home screen (and the icons) to its normal, smaller size. Advertisement

[5] Some manufacturers include the ability to customize icon size in their versions of Android. [6] On some Sony phones (and possibly others), this action will open a toolbar at the bottom of the screen. Image titled Make Desktop Icons Smaller Step 6 2 Select Home Settings or Desktop Settings . Image titled Make Desktop Icons Smaller Step 7 3 Tap Icon Size to view size options. Some phones will have two options small and large while others may allow you to be more specific in your customization. Image titled Make Desktop Icons Smaller Step 8 4 Select Small , then navigate back to the desktop to view your changes. Advertisement
